definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: turn (?) (cf. As. abâku Dl:w = [[הָפַח]]; Thes MV al. compare [[בוך]])

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: [[וַיִּתְאַבְכוּ]] Is 9:17; roll, roll up, as volume of smoke (of Isr. under fig. of thickets of forest) v. De & cf. [[הִתִהַפֵּח]] Ju Jdg 7:3.
